attributes.action: make it illegal for restaurants to automatically add service charge to a bill
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although there is no legal requirement for diners to pay a service or cover charge, when faced with a bill to which 10, 12.5 or even 15% has been added, most people will pay rather than appear "tight" and regardless of whether or not the service has warranted a tip.  I would like to choose whether to give and how much based on the service received and be confident it will be enjoyed by those who have earned it and not used as extra income by the restaurant to make up their low levels of staff pay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
